data.text:
The experience that my relatives from New Jersey (USA) had in this hotel was regrettable.

During their absence from the room on Tuesday, February 6, 2024, $600 was stolen from the room from a wallet deposited on one of the shelves in the room (the rooms do not have a safe).

That same day, we went to the Police station in Barcelona to write the corresponding complaint.

The worst thing about the case is the arrogant, rude, and absolutely despicable attitude of the supposed person in charge of the hotel who did not even have the slightest empathy with his clients, nor did he apologize on behalf of the hotel, nor did he lift nothing to find out. what had happened and that he even insinuated that the complaint was false to try to obtain some compensation

Each one to do what they consider appropriate but this hotel is not, at all, recommended.

A complaint has also been filed with the Ministry of Industry and Consumer Affairs of the Generalitat of Catalonia and a request/complaint has been issued to the management of the Accor chain itself.
data.title: Very unpleasant experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest,

We are really sorry to hear what you mention, but we investigated what happened since the first beginning and we explained that to the costumers.

When there is a firm accusation to one of our employees, we launched the protocol to investigate the situation, and we recommend you to file the pertinent complaint to the police to investigate more exhaustively with them.

We hope this situation can be solved promptly for all of us, and we will handle all the correlated information to the police as soon as they demand it.

Best regards
owner_response.author: IBIS BCN MERIDIANA

data.text:

The hotel is near to metro station about 07min walk, mall next door, the  breakfast buffet limited items however it is fresh all the team members are friendly special thanks to Chaimae and lamiae big thanks ladies for your assistance and kindness it was our first visit and won’t be the last
data.title: Highly recommended

data.text: It’s a little off the regular tourist path but I would stay there again. Hotel is extremely clean and has the basic essentials for a comfortable stay. No laundry service but there is a self-service laundry centre within walking distance. Also located very close to a metro/train station so can be anywhere in the city quite quickly.  Hotel located beside a small shopping area with a grocery store and a number of restaurants. Hotel staff very friendly and helpful. I would stay here again. My only comment: if you have scent-sensitivities, wear a mask in the lobby as there can be strong scents at times.
data.title: Very comfortable, good value for money hotel

data.text:
This hotel was on the cheaper end for Barcelona -- which doesn't mean cheap, just less expensive in a very expensive city. For the room rate of around £169/night when we stayed, it was underwhelming. The bedsheet had an obvious tear in it but was used anyway. The desk in the room had splatters on it from a previous guest. The shower had long hairs in it from a previous guest. No facial tissues in the room. Many satellite TV channels not available on the very small monitor. 

On the plus side, the front desk staff were always friendly and attentive and quickly responsive. There is a dining area in the lobby when one can work, have a coffee or a beer. There is a shopping mall next door with numerous shopping and dining options. Although it's not in the centre of the city, there are several Metro stations within about a 10-minute walk and the major attractions are 30 to 40 minutes away.

As other reviewers mentioned, the room key would also sometimes stop working. This happened to me twice, causing me each time to go back down from the 10th floor to Reception to have the key reactivated. This was frustrating, especially after a busy day when I was ready to shower and relax.

Overall I felt things were done on the cheap here, and for the price they could have afforded to do a bit better. But the service is good and the front-desk staff deserve compliments. I probably would not stay here again if other similar priced options are available. I would probably pay £20 to £30 more per night to stay somewhere nicer if that was the difference. They could do better.
data.title: Underwhelming, could be better - but good service

data.text: The location is not so good, as it is far from all the tourist attractions of Barcelona, however, Barcelona's transport system compensates for this problem. The rooms are small but very well designed, the breakfast is very good and it is ideal for families.
data.title: Family visit to Barcelona
